Configuring shadow
Shadow's Configuration File
/etc/login.defs
Enabling MD5 Passwords
To enable MD5 Passwords, modify the line in the login.defs file that reads: #MD5_CRYPT_ENAB no to read: MD5_CRYPT_ENAB yes Passwords created after this change will be encrypted using MD5 instead of using DES encryption.
